name: Not Pong (Nick Nikolaou)
description:
NotPong is a simple 1 versus 1 online multiplayer game, based on the classic video game Pong, with a couple of twists.

The objective is to get the bomb to explode in the other player’s part of the ‘field’ or their ‘goal’.

Note: The game server is currently hosted in Australia so online games will likely be unplayable unless you're in Australia. (or maybe Asia)
